scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:react && npm run install:vue && npm run install:svelte && npm run install:solidjs && npm run install:vanilla && echo 'All apps installed successfully!'
scripts.build: npm run build:all && npm run collect:dist && echo 'All apps built and collected successfully!'
scripts.build:all: npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:svelte && npm run build:solidjs && npm run build:vanilla
scripts.collect:dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -R react-app/dist/* dist/ && cp -R vue-app/dist/* dist/ && cp -R svelte-app/dist/* dist/ && cp -R solidjs-app/dist/* dist/ && cp -R vanilla-app/dist/* dist/
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:react" "npm run dev:vue" "npm run dev:svelte" "npm run dev:solidjs" "npm run dev:vanilla"
